description: Used this to make a desktop version of Kaleidosync. Worked perfectly.
Been looking for a while for a Linux app that essentially turns websites into web applications! Works better than any others I've used before! Great job and hats off to the Dev, thank you!

Download. Open Terminal. Type at prompt:
nativefier 'https://www.icloud.com'
and hit enter. A folder(iCloud-linux-x64)in your home directory shows up with an executable (iCloud). Add it to your menu(menu-libre). Open it, login, and enjoy Apple apps on your Linux desktop.
